metadata.name: The Act of Rest
metadata.description:
As a heartfelt expression of my gratitude to all who have supported my work in the Joy of Living series on ETH, whether you were a winning bidder or not, I am honored to present this special token of appreciation.

I believe that joy is a precious gift, and my art is my way of sharing that gift with you. May it bring a spark of joy to your day, and inspire you to see the beauty and wonder in the world around us.

Thank you for being a part of my artistic journey, and for helping me to realize my dream. I am deeply grateful.
